author: robocopsgonemad
content: i forgot to ask on the call: do we have any forkmon graphs for the hour or so we saw problems on devnet-12? was seeing reorgs going back 30-40 blocks or so

author: parithosh
content: 7day reorg graph on xatu atleast, don't all click the link at once as its a bigboi query: https://grafana.observability.ethpandaops.io/d/MR_U64N4k/beacon-api-events?orgId=1&var-network_name=dencun-devnet-12&var-client_name=All&var-consensus_implementation=All&var-consensus_version=All&var-geo_continent_code=All&var-heatmap_interval=250&var-interval_tight=$__auto_interval_interval_tight&var-interval=$__auto_interval_interval&var-interval_loose=$__auto_interval_interval_loose&var-table_prefix=&var-attestation_prefix=&from=now-7d&to=now
